trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown by the **Load** method when an error is found in the XSLT style sheet.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
The message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref> class using the information in the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> objects.

The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SerializationInfo" name="SerializationInfo" href=""></xref> object containing all the properties of an <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref>.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamingContext" name="StreamingContext" href=""></xref> object containing the context information.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException"></xref> class specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no inner exception is specified.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Exception> that threw the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref>.
The location path of the style sheet.
The line number indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
The line position indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.

Streams all the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltCompileException" name="XsltCompileException" href=""></xref> properties into the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> class for the given <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
